code: public void configure() {     HazelcastRoutePolicy policy = new HazelcastRoutePolicy().     policy.setLockMapName("camel:lock:map").     policy.setLockKey("route-policy").     policy.setLockValue(args[1]).     policy.setTryLockTimeout(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).     from("file:///tmp/camel?DELETE=true").routeId(args[1]).routePolicy(policy).setHeader("HazelcastRouteID", constant(args[1])).setHeader("HazelcastServiceName", constant(args[0])).to("log:org.apache.camel.component.hazelcast?level=INFO&showAll=true"). }

public static void main(final String[] args) throws Exception {     Main main = new Main().     main.addRouteBuilder(new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             HazelcastRoutePolicy policy = new HazelcastRoutePolicy().             policy.setLockMapName("camel:lock:map").             policy.setLockKey("route-policy").             policy.setLockValue(args[1]).             policy.setTryLockTimeout(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).             from("file:///tmp/camel?DELETE=true").routeId(args[1]).routePolicy(policy).setHeader("HazelcastRouteID", constant(args[1])).setHeader("HazelcastServiceName", constant(args[0])).to("log:org.apache.camel.component.hazelcast?level=INFO&showAll=true").         }     }).     main.run(). }
